title: James Cleverly – 2022 Comments on the Dismissal of Kwasi Kwarteng
author: admin
summary: The comments made by James Cleverly, the Foreign Secretary, on Twitter on 14 October 2022.
content:
The PM is right that growing the economy is the best way to secure the UK’s economic stability.
